sentences.english: Decreased overall still in channels, short-short pattern is unchanged.
sentences.chinese: 總體仍處於下跌通道中，短期空頭格局不變。

sentences.english: A short seller bets that a stock price will fall.
sentences.chinese: 有一個空頭押注該公司股票價格將下跌。

sentences.english: To offer a loaf of bread is more useful than making an empty promise.
sentences.chinese: 拿出一個麪包比開一張空頭支票更有用。

sentences.english: In reality, short-selling is far from being financial black magic.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，空頭並非金融巫婆。

sentences.english: None of these restrictions impose a really onerous burden on short-sellers.
sentences.chinese: 所有這些限制，實際都沒給空頭施加太重的負擔。

sentences.english: When both indicators fall together, they show that bears are crushing the market.
sentences.chinese: 當2個指標同時下跌，它表明空頭在砸盤。

sentences.english: From Zheng cotton high low open view of the situation, short is more dominant.
sentences.chinese: 而從鄭棉高開低走的態勢來看，空頭更佔優勢。

sentences.english: IT IS difficult being a short-seller.
We needed her help but were fobbed off by promises.
sentences.chinese: 我們很需要她的幫助，但她用空頭支票忽悠了我們。

sentences.english: When both fall, bears are in control and the bar is red.
sentences.chinese: 當兩個指標下跌時，空頭在主導，竹線是紅色的。

sentences.english: We’d agree that the idea of reuse was oversold and oversimplified.
sentences.chinese: 我們同意，重用的想法是空頭支票，並且過度簡化了。

sentences.english: Your empty promises are lost on the skeptical consumer.
sentences.chinese: 你的空頭許諾對於多疑的客戶來說毫無用途。
這一不對稱性是空頭的一大障礙。

sentences.english: As bear raids can be self-validating, they ought to be kept under control.
sentences.chinese: 由於空頭襲擊可以自我驗證，它們應處於控制之下。
